summary: Comprehensive testing of Contracts & Budget Control feature completed successfully. All core functionality working: contract CRUD operations, employee assignment to contracts, budget utilization calculations, and navigation integration. Backend API 100% functional with all contract endpoints working correctly. Frontend UI fully operational with proper contract management workflows.

design_issues.issue: Missing accessibility descriptions for dialog content components
design_issues.details: Console warnings about missing Description or aria-describedby attributes - accessibility improvement needed but not functional issue

passed_tests: Backend Contract CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Contract-Employee assignment and unassignment
Budget utilization calculations (labor cost / budget * 100)
Contract details with assigned employees list
Contract statistics aggregation (total contracts, active, total budget, labor cost)
Employee contract assignment via dropdown in employee form
Contracts page loads with all 4 stats cards
Create new contract workflow with form validation
Edit existing contract functionality
View contract details with budget utilization progress bar
Delete contract with employee unassignment
Navigation integration - Contracts menu item in sidebar
Employee table shows contract assignment column
British Pound (Â£) currency formatting in contract budgets
Success notifications for contract operations
Error handling for non-existent contracts (404 responses)
Contract status management (active, completed, on_hold)
Monthly labor cost calculations
Budget remaining calculations
Real-time stats updates after contract operations
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor accessibility improvement: Add aria-describedby attributes to DialogContent components for better screen reader support. All core Contracts & Budget Control functionality is working perfectly.
